section.name: Go to Document Types Tab
section.span: How to get to the document types tab, to add and change document types.

img.alt: Go to document types tab screenshot

div.p: Opened document types folder shown. It is a subfolder of the configuration folder. The subfolders of the document types folder are namespaces. There is one namespace in this example, called 'defaultcontent'. It is the namespace for default content.

section.p: In the list of content folders (in the content browse tab, at middle-left), click on the configuration folder and find the documenttypes subfolder. If not already open, click on that to see its subfolders, which are namespaces. The list of namespaces appears below the document types folder and in a list at middle-right.
